settings.title: Initiate a return request:
settings.text: Please contact our customer service within 30 days from the date you receive . Please provide your order number, reason for return, and clear photos of the item.

settings.title: Approval:
settings.text: Once approved, we will send you the return address.

settings.title: Refund:
settings.text: Once we have inspected your returned item, we will complete your refund within 3-10 business days.

settings.form_description:
To cancel your order or exchange an item, you can contact us at this email address.

Please note: Once an order has been shipped, it cannot be canceled.
settings.sidebar_subtitle: We are happy to accept returns and exchanges within 30 days from the date you receive your order.
settings.live_help_title: Returned products must meet the following conditions:
settings.live_help_text: Due to hygiene reasons, wigs must not be cut, bleached, dyed, altered, or visibly worn. The lace must remain uncut and unaltered. For these reasons, we recommend inspecting the wig without removing the inner hair net or tampering with the lace.
settings.contact_address:
If your item is delivered with a hygiene seal, once broken, the item becomes non-returnable unless it is faulty.

Unauthorised or returned items that do not meet these criteria may not be eligible for a refund.
settings.opening_hours: Please view the full Return and Exchange Policy*

settings.heading: Wig Bundle Gift Campaign:Campaign Overview
settings.row_content: Purchase any wig product from ailsas.com and receive an exclusive free gift bundle as a thank-you reward. This offer is available for a limited number of early customers.

settings.heading: Wig Bundle Gift Campaign:Eligibility
settings.row_content:
This campaign is valid for orders that include any full-price or discounted wig.

Accessories-only orders (e.g. wig caps, combs, bags) do not qualify.

Valid only for customers based in the UK.

Each order is eligible for one gift pack only.

settings.heading: Wig Bundle Gift Campaign:What‚Äôs Included in the Gift Pack
settings.row_content:
Our curated gift pack typically includes:

1√ó Reusable Ailsa‚Äôs Shopping Bag
1√ó HairJewelry
1√ó Wig Cap
1√ó Vent Hair Brush
1√ó Wig Band
1√ó Satin Gift Bag
1√ó Wig Cap


üéÅ Please note:

Product style, colour, and packaging may vary, and cannot be chosen by the customer.

Items are dispatched randomly depending on stock availability.

If any item is out of stock, it will be substituted with an item of equal or greater value at our discretion.

settings.heading: Wig Bundle Gift Campaign:Delivery & Returns
settings.row_content:
Gift packs are automatically added to eligible orders during warehouse processing.

Gifts are non-exchangeable and non-returnable.

If an order is returned in full, the gift pack must also be returned unused and unopened.

If the gift is not returned, Ailsa‚Äôs reserves the right to deduct the gift value from the total refund amount.

settings.heading: Wig Bundle Gift Campaign:Participation Limit
settings.row_content:
This campaign is available to the first 50 qualifying customers only, on a first-come, first-served basis.

Once the quota is reached, the gift pack will no longer be included.

settings.heading: Wig Bundle Gift Campaign:Other Important Notes
settings.row_content:
Ailsa‚Äôs reserves the right to make final decisions regarding gift pack qualification and substitutions.

This campaign cannot be combined with other promotions offering physical gifts.

Terms are subject to change at any time without prior notice.

settings.heading: Wig Bundle Gift Campaign: Terms & Conditions
UGC Cashback Campaign: Campaign Overview
settings.row_content: We value every voice from our customers. Join our User Generated Content (UGC) Cashback Campaign and receive 50% cashback on your wig order by submitting authentic photos or videos of your wig-wearing experience!

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Eligibility
settings.row_content:
Open to customers who have purchased any wig product directly from ailsas.com.

Accessories (such as wig caps or styling tools) are excluded from this campaign.

Valid only for customers residing in the UK.

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign:  How to Participate
settings.row_content:
Step 1 ‚Äì Place an order for any wig on our website.

Step 2 ‚Äì After receiving the wig, submit one of the following:

Clear, front-facing photo(s) wearing the wig (minimum three image)

Short video showing unboxing, trying-on, or styling experience

Step 3 ‚Äì Email your submission to:
hello@ailsas.com
Include your order number, name, and media content in the email.

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign:  Cashback Details
settings.row_content:
‚úîÔ∏è Get 50% of your order value back once your content is approved.

‚úîÔ∏è Cashback will be returned via the original payment method.

‚úîÔ∏è Processing time: 3 working days

‚úîÔ∏è One cashback per order only

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Participation Limit
settings.row_content:
The offer is available for the first 100 qualified participants only ‚Äì on a first-come, first-served basis.

No official end date, but spots are limited. Act fast!

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Content Rights
settings.row_content:
By submitting your content, you agree to grant Ailsa‚Äôs the rights to use your photos or videos for:

Website display

Social media and advertising campaigns

Email promotions and related marketing activities

Ailsa‚Äôs may edit or crop submissions for visual clarity without altering the intent or authenticity. All content will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

settings.heading: UGC Cashback Campaign: Disclaimer & Final Rights
settings.row_content:
Ailsa‚Äôs reserves the right to make final decisions regarding cashback eligibility.

Fraudulent, unclear, or duplicate content will not qualify.

These terms may be subject to change without prior notice.
